layout.name: Opening Hours
layout.description: Clean display of business hours in a visually appealing format. Highlight current day if applicable. Note: Closed on Sunday and Monday.

layout.name: Location/Contact

layout.name: Footer

layout.name: Disclaimer Modal

featureImplementations.implementation: Create separate URL routes (/it, /de, /fr, /en) with Italian as default (based on Ticino location - postal code 6830). Store translations in JSON files. Language switcher in header.
Show modal on first visit with localStorage flag to prevent showing again. Modal contains draft warning, no Google indexing notice, potential errors disclaimer, and dismiss button.
Mobile-first CSS with breakpoints at 640px (sm), 768px (md), 1024px (lg). Hamburger menu on mobile, full nav on desktop. Stack columns on mobile, grid on larger screens.
Download logo from provided URL and store in assets directory. Use as header logo and generate favicon from it.
Title: 'Bluemarine - Salone di Parrucchiere | Chiasso'. Description summarizing services. Open Graph tags for social sharing. Language tag set to Italian.
No contact form per requirements. Display phone (+41916822882) as clickable tel: link, full address, and Facebook link directly.
Visual table/list showing Tue-Sat hours. Note closure on Sun-Mon. Optionally highlight current day.
Smooth scroll to sections with anchor links. Fixed header with section detection for active state highlighting.

additionalNotes: This is a hair salon website for Bluemarine located in Chiasso, Switzerland (Ticino region). The design uses deep marine blue (#1E5F8A) as primary color to reflect the 'Bluemarine' name, complemented by lighter blue secondary tones and a warm accent color for contrast. Typography pairs elegant Playfair Display for headings (conveying sophistication) with clean Inter for body text (modern readability). The single-page layout prioritizes fast loading and easy navigation. Default language is Italian due to Ticino location. No gallery section needed as no gallery images are provided in the brief. Emphasis on the salon's key differentiators: warm welcome, dedicated time for each customer, parking availability, and constantly updated techniques.
